text:
Company: Watson, Anderson and Serrano

Role: Student Legal Specialist

Company Background: Watson, Anderson and Serrano is a renowned law firm with a strong commitment to diversity and inclusion. We specialize in providing top-notch legal services across various fields, maintaining a robust and inclusive work environment.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
Watson, Anderson and Serrano is seeking a motivated Student Legal Specialist to join our dynamic legal team. This role is perfect for individuals passionate about law and eager to gain valuable experience in a supportive and inclusive environment.

Responsibilities:
- Assist senior attorneys in legal research and documentation.
- Support the preparation of legal briefs and arguments.
- Participate in client meetings and case strategy sessions.
- Maintain organized files and legal documents.
- Conduct preliminary case analysis and prepare reports.

Qualifications and Experience:
- Current enrollment in a law program or recent graduate.
- Strong research and analytical skills.
- Excellent written and verbal communication abilities.
- Attention to detail and organizational skills.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment.
- We value an inclusive workforce and invite people with disabilities to apply.

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive health insurance packages.
- Paid time off and flexible working hours.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Mentorship programs with senior attorneys.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 40,000 to USD 60,000, based on your experience and skills.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their qualifications and interest in the role. Help us achieve our inclusion goals by applying – we welcome candidates with disabilities.
